house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1988 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, IntercomSystem, Loft, Microwave, Pantry, Skylights, Tennis Court(s)
